Headline: Correction: #53A South Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/87th
ShortDescription: Correction: 53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 95th, Cicero, Southwest Hwy, and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Correction: #53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 95th, Cicero, Southwest Hwy, and Pulaski due to, street blockage near Pulaski/87th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/87th
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Lawndale, Southwest Hwy,87th, and Cicero due to, street blockage at Pulaski/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 87th, Lawndale, Southwest Hwy, 87th, and Cicero due to, street blockage at Pulaski/87th.

Allow extra travel time.
